text: Vladimir Sergeyevich Lisin (born 7 May 1956) is a Russian billionaire businessman. He is the chairman and majority shareholder of Novolipetsk (NLMK), one of the four largest steel companies in Russia. According to Forbes he was the richest man in Russia and 48th richest in the world in 2013. As of 2018, his estimated net worth is $20.6 billion.Russian Capitalist Wiki contributors, "Vladimir Lisin" . Russian Capitalist Wiki. title: Vladimir Lisin
